inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: jet velocity greater than 4.0m/s or Doppler Velocity index <0.25

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: New York Heart Association (NYHA) functional class 2 or greater

inclusion.criterion: Surgical risk is deemed high or intermediate
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Society of Thoracic Surgery (STS) risk score

exclusion.criterion: Patient is unwilling or unable to comply with study-required follow-up evaluations
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Myocardial infarction within 30 days to index procedure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing prosthetic cardiac device, valve or prosthetic ring
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Untreated significant coronary artery disease requiring revascularization
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease

exclusion.criterion: Echocardiographic evidence of intra-cardiac mass, thrombus or vegetation suggesting active endocarditis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hemodynamically unstable requiring inotropic or vasopressive and / or mechanical support
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
